typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SOURCE_CODE_KEY as string,
		SOURCE_SYSTEM as string,
		TARGET_CODE as string,
		TARGET_DESCRIPTION as string,
		CODE_TYPE as string,
		CODE_TYPE_ID as double,
		CODE2 as string,
		OM_X_REF as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> TCrossReference
TCrossReference filter(CODE_TYPE_ID==106 && TARGET_CODE!='PI') ~> FilterBuinessAreaAndNoPICode
SelectOnlyTargetColumns aggregate(groupBy(target_code,
		target_description),
	each(match(!in(['target_code','target_description'],name)), $$ = first($$))) ~> Deduplicator
Deduplicator derive(GRP_CODE = case(in(['EN','BU'],Deduplicator@target_code), 'EG', case(in(['PM', 'PF'], Deduplicator@target_code), 'PI', Deduplicator@target_code)),
		GRP_DESCRIPTION = case(in(['EN','BU'],Deduplicator@target_code), 'Energy+', case(in(['PM', 'PF'], Deduplicator@target_code), 'P&I', Deduplicator@target_description)),
		BUA_CODE = case(in(['PM','PF'],Deduplicator@target_code), 'PI', Deduplicator@target_code),
		BUA_DESCRIPTION = case(in(['PM','PF'],Deduplicator@target_code), 'P&I', Deduplicator@target_description),
		LAST_UPDATED_BY = 'm_pre_dim_business_area') ~> ExpressionMedLastUpdatedBy
FilterBuinessAreaAndNoPICode select(mapColumn(
		target_code = TARGET_CODE,
		target_description = TARGET_DESCRIPTION
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectOnlyTargetColumns
ExpressionMedLastUpdatedBy sink(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> preDimBusinessAreaUpdate
